verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> Surely בְּלֵ֞יל <S%H3915><s%> Because in the night שֻׁדַּ֨ד <S%H7703><s%> is laid waste עָ֤ר <S%H6144><s%> Ar מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab נִדְמָ֔ה <S%H1820><s%> [and] brought to silence כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Surely בְּלֵ֛יל <S%H3915><s%> because in the night שֻׁדַּ֥ד <S%H7703><s%> is laid waste קִיר־ <S%H7024><s%> Kir מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab נִדְמָֽה׃ <S%H1820><s%> [and] brought to silence

עָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> He is gone up הַבַּ֧יִת <S%H1004><s%> to the temple וְדִיבֹ֛ן <S%H1769><s%> and to Dibon הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places לְבֶ֑כִי <S%H1065><s%> to weep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over נְב֞וֹ <S%H5015><s%> over Nebo וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> over מֵֽידְבָא֙ <S%H4311><s%> and over Medeba מוֹאָ֣ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab יְיֵלִ֔יל <S%H3213><s%> shall howl בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone's רֹאשָׁ֣יו <S%H7218><s%> on all their heads קָרְחָ֔ה <S%H7144><s%> [shall be] baldness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָקָ֖ן <S%H2206><s%> [and] every beard גְּרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H1639><s%> is cut

בְּחוּצֹתָ֖יו <S%H2351><s%> In their streets חָ֣גְרוּ <S%H2296><s%> they shall gird שָׂ֑ק <S%H8242><s%> themselves with sackcloth עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on גַּגּוֹתֶ֧יהָ <S%H1406><s%> on the tops וּבִרְחֹבֹתֶ֛יהָ <S%H7339><s%> of their houses and in their streets כֻּלֹּ֥ה <S%H3605><s%> Everyone יְיֵלִ֖יל <S%H3213><s%> every one shall howl יֹרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> abundantly בַּבֶּֽכִי׃ <S%H1065><s%> weeping

וַתִּזְעַ֤ק <S%H2199><s%> shall cry חֶשְׁבּוֹן֙ <S%H2809><s%> And Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֔ה <S%H500><s%> and Elealeh עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> all יַ֖הַץ <S%H3096><s%> [even] unto Jahaz נִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> shall be heard קוֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that חֲלֻצֵ֤י <S%H2502><s%> therefore the armed soldiers מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab יָרִ֔יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shall cry out נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his life יָ֥רְעָה <S%H3415><s%> shall be grievous לּֽוֹ׃

לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> My heart לְמוֹאָ֣ב <S%H4124><s%> for Moab יִזְעָ֔ק <S%H2199><s%> shall cry out בְּרִיחֶ֕הָ <S%H1280><s%> his fugitives עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far צֹ֖עַר <S%H6820><s%> [shall flee] unto Zoar עֶגְלַ֣ת <S%H5697><s%> an heifer שְׁלִשִׁיָּ֑ה <S%H7992><s%> of three years old כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> Surely מַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> for by the mounting up הַלּוּחִ֗ית <S%H3872><s%> of Luhith בִּבְכִי֙ <S%H1065><s%> with weeping יַֽעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> shall they go it up בּ֔וֹ כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Surely דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> for in the way חוֹרֹנַ֔יִם <S%H2773><s%> of Horonaim זַעֲקַת־ <S%H2201><s%> a cry שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> of destruction יְעֹעֵֽרוּ׃ <S%H5782><s%> they shall raise up

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> For the waters נִמְרִ֖ים <S%H5249><s%> of Nimrim מְשַׁמּ֣וֹת <S%H4923><s%> shall be desolate יִֽהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely יָבֵ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> is withered away חָצִיר֙ <S%H2682><s%> for the hay כָּ֣לָה <S%H3615><s%> faileth דֶ֔שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> the grass יֶ֖רֶק <S%H3418><s%> there is no green thing לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is no הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִתְרָ֣ה <S%H3502><s%> Therefore the abundance עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> they have gotten וּפְקֻדָּתָ֔ם <S%H6486><s%> and that which they have laid up עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> over נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> to the brook הָעֲרָבִ֖ים <S%H6155><s%> of the willows יִשָּׂאֽוּם׃ <S%H5375><s%> shall they carry away

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִקִּ֥יפָה <S%H5362><s%> is gone round about הַזְּעָקָ֖ה <S%H2201><s%> For the cry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> the borders מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אֶגְלַ֙יִם֙ <S%H97><s%> thereof unto Eglaim יִלְלָתָ֔הּ <S%H3215><s%> the howling וּבְאֵ֥ר אֵילִ֖ים <S%H879><s%> thereof unto Beerelim יִלְלָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H3215><s%> and the howling

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> For the waters דִימוֹן֙ <S%H1775><s%> of Dimon מָ֣לְאוּ <S%H4390><s%> shall be full דָ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely אָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> for I will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon דִּימ֖וֹן <S%H1775><s%> upon Dimon נוֹסָפ֑וֹת <S%H3254><s%> more לִפְלֵיטַ֤ת <S%H6413><s%> upon him that escapeth מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> lions וְלִשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> and upon the remnant אֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the land
